description: Hettiarachchi Kankanamge Dhanasiri Vs. The Hon. Attorney General before Hon. Sampath B. Abayakoon, J.
parties: Hettiarachchi Kankanamge Dhanasiri Vs. The Hon. Attorney General
keywords: Kidnapping of an underage boy from his legal guardian - Grave sexual abuse - Mitigatory as well as the aggravating circumstances - Absconding the Court - Inter se and per secontradictions - Question of Identity - Trustworthiness of Evidence - Consistency ofEvidence - Beyond reasonable doubt
legistation: Penal Code Section 354 Penal Code as amended by Penal Code Amendment Act No. 22 of 1995, 29 of 1998 and 16 of 2006 Section 365B(2)(b) Code of Criminal Procedure Act Section 241 Evidence OrdinanceSection 134
